blog.name: alert-danger-queers
blog.title: The Florida Woman of Your Nightmares
blog.description:
Baby I’m bi bi bi

This is my main account which means just a bunch of random shit thrown together

I post a lot of Marvel but I usually get a new obsession once a month

summary:
Tony: Hey kids, give me a hand with this suit I’m working on will ya? It got damaged pretty bad in that last brawl.
Peter: Sorry...
body:
Tony: Hey kids, give me a hand with this suit I’m working on will ya? It got damaged pretty bad in that last brawl.

Peter: Sorry Tony, but we’ve got a big break in the case. We’re heading into the city to interrogate the murderer.

Harley: I brought an axe!


Tony: Seems like something a responsible parent wouldn’t want you doing…

Peter:…


Harley:…


Tony: Good thing I’m a mentor! AVENGE ME KIDS

reblog.comment:

blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

summary: I have tickets for the opening night for Endgame.
body:
I have tickets for the opening night for Endgame.

And because i am lucky enough to live in germany i‘m going to see it two days prior to almost the rest of the world.

summary: Saving The Spiderling
title: Saving The Spiderling
body:

by Nicola_Xxx

Peter knew he was breaking. What kind of teenager could handle being a high school student and a superhero? It was only a matter of time before something bad happens, will anyone save him before it’s too late?

summary: might never be normal again (but who cares)
title: might never be normal again (but who cares)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IynZ8q

by napricot

The beginnings of a plan took shape in Steve’s mind, as clear and simple as a tactical frontal assault. He’d prove to Bucky that this was it, he was staying: Steve was retired from the fighting game, Steve wasn’t going to let anything keep pulling them apart. Maybe then when Steve finally told him he loved him, Bucky would believe him.

All things considered, Steve thought he’d handled the whole Thanos killing half the universe thing and the ensuing bitter, desperate quest to defeat him pretty well. Sacrificing his super soldier serum to use one of the Infinity Stones wasn’t a problem either, not when it meant getting back the half of the universe they’d lost, and especially not when it meant getting Bucky back. But retirement and finally confessing his feelings for Bucky? Those were proving to be more challenging.

Words: 9009, Chapters: ¼, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), Tony Stark
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Not Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Compliant, Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, De-Serumed Steve Rogers, Retirement, First Time, Pining, Fix-It, Slow Burn


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IynZ8q

blog.name: sarcastictonystark
blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description:
